ROM 11.32 galauk auk guþ allans in ungalaubeinai, ei allans gaarmai.
ROM 11.34 ƕas auk ufkunþa fraþi fraujins aiþþau ƕas imma ragineis was?
ROM 11.35 aiþþau ƕas imma fruma gaf, jah fragildaidau imma?
ROM 11.36 unte us imma jah þairh ina jah in imma alla;
ROM 12.1 Bidja nu izwis, broþrjus, þairh bleiþein gudis, usgiban leika izwara saud qiwana, weihana, waila galeikaidana guda, andaþahtana blotinassu izwarana.
ROM 12.2 ni galeikoþ izwis þamma aiwa, ak inmaidjaiþ ananiujiþai fraþjis izwaris du gakiusan ƕa sijai wilja gudis, þatei goþ jah galeikaiþ jah ustauhan.
ROM 12.3 qiþa auk þairh anst gudis sei gibana ist mis, allaim wisandam in izwis, ni mais fraþjan þau skuli fraþjan, ak fraþjan du waila fraþjan, ƕarjammeh swaswe guþ gadailida mitaþ galaubeinais.

ROM 12.4 swaswe raihtis in ainamma leika liþuns managans habam, þai-þ-þan liþjus allai ni þata samo taui haband; ROM 12.5 swa managai ain leik sijum in Xristau, aþþan ainƕarjizuh anþar anþaris liþjus...
ROM 12.10 broþralubon in izwis misso friaþwamildjai;
ROM 12.16 þata samo in izwis misso fraþjandans;
ni hauhaba hugjandans, ak þaim hnaiwam miþgawisandans;
ni wairþaiþ inahai bi izwis silbam.
ROM 12.17 ni ainummehun ubil und ubilamma usgibandans;
bisaiƕandans godis ni þatainei in andwairþja gudis, ak jah in andwairþja manne allaize.
ROM 12.18 jabai magi wairþan us izwis, miþ allaim mannam gawairþi habandans.
ROM 12.19 ni izwis silbans gawrikandans, liubans, ak gibiþ staþ þwairhein;
ROM 12.20 jabai gredo fijand þeinana, mat gif imma;
þata auk taujands haurja funins rikis ana haubiþ is.
ROM 12.21 ni gajiukaizau af unþiuþa, ak gajiukais þiuþa unþiuþ.
ROM 13.1 All saiwalo waldufnjam ufarwisandam ufhausjai;
unte nist waldufni alja fram guda, iþ þo wisandona fram guda gasatida sind.
ROM 13.2 swaei sa andstandands waldufnja gudis garaideinai andstoþ;
iþ þai andstandandans silbans sis wargiþa nimand.
ROM 13.3 þai auk reiks ni sind agis godamma waurstwa, ak ubilamma;
aþþan wileis ei ni ogeis waldufni,
þiuþ taujais jah habais hazein us þamma;
ROM 13.4 unte gudis andbahts ist þus in godamma.
unte ni sware þana hairau bairiþ;
gudis auk andbahts ist, fraweitands in þwairhein þamma ubil taujandin.
ROM 13.5 duþþe ufhausjaiþ ni þatainei in þwairheins, ak jah in miþwisseins.
ROM 13.6 in-uþ-þis auk jah gilstra ustiuhaiþ;
unte andbahtos gudis sind in þamma silbin skalkinondans.
ROM 13.8 ni ainummehun waihtais skulans sijaiþ, niba þatei izwis misso frijoþ;
unte saei frijoþ neƕundjan, witoþ usfullida.
ROM 13.9 þata auk: ni horinos, ni maurþrjais, ni hlifais, nih faihugeigais, jah jabai ƕo anþaraizo anabusne ist, in þamma waurda usfulljada, þamma: frijos neƕundjan þeinana swe þuk silban.
